name: Wizard Break (Valleix Martin)
description:
You are the magic shield knight and you have to fight a fire wizard. Fortunately, you shield can return his fireball, that if you position it correctly. You will have to pass through the level in order to reach the wizard, all of this without being hit by the bouncing fiery ball.

Development team :

Graphist, Level Designer : Loïc Thibaut

Graphist : Charlène Bourget

Graphist : Natacha Lo Tsiu Chih

Programmer, Level Designer : Martin Valleix
